item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, August 16, 2024 at 2:35 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Starbucks’ new chief awarded $113mn pay deal and remote office in Newport Beach
2. [Opinion] Reeves has the best chance since Lloyd George of reforming property tax
3. English council claims Dubai-based businessman misused £150mn
4. Harris spends 10 times as much as Trump on digital ad blitz
5. Ukraine and Russia begin talks on exchange of prisoners captured in Kursk
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, August 16, 2024 at 2:35 AM UTC
